parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.56

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Menu

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns data stored in menu entry on given path.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[menuData]] [idc, path]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control [[menuData]] path

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value>  <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Create an entry which will return its data once clicked</value></part></template>
[[private]] _ctrlMenuStrip = [[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120;
[[private]] _indexMain = _ctrlMenuStrip [[menuAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[], "Custom Tools"];
[[private]] _indexData = _ctrlMenuStrip [[menuAdd]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[_indexMain],"This entry will print its data to system chat when clicked"];
_ctrlMenuStrip [[menuSetData]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[_indexMain,_indexData], "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>[[objNull]],'Some String',[[true]]]"];
_ctrlMenuStrip [[menuSetAction]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[_indexMain,_indexData], "[[systemChat]] ([[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120 [[menuData]] ([[menuHover]] ([[findDisplay]] 313 [[displayCtrl]] 120)));"];
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[menuSetData]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
